titles.title: Uniform Trade Sanctions Act
Providing that State and local laws prohibiting or otherwise restricting economic activity with foreign countries are null and void.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 10/24/2000--Introduced. Uniform Trade Sanctions Act - Declares null and void any State or local government law that imposes specified economic restrictions or conditions with respect to any foreign country, or with a foreign country or its nationals or entities by reason of specified conduct by such foreign country, nationals, or entities. Authorizes the Attorney General to bring, on behalf of the United States, a suit to declare invalid or enjoin enforcement of any State or local economic restriction or condition against a foreign country.
